title: Mark Cavendish and his Tour de France Train are Already Coming Together: ‘We Can Hit the Ground Running’
content:
There won't be any improvisation in the 'Cavendish Express' with the arrival of confirmed stars like Mørkøv and Ballerini for 2024 in quest to better Eddy Merckx record.

Read the full article at Mark Cavendish and his Tour de France Train are Already Coming Together: ‘We Can Hit the Ground Running’ on Velo.
author: ahood
